2659.T.summary: SAN-A CO.,LTD. operates a chain of supermarkets in Okinawa. Its products include groceries and clothing items, cosmetics, housing-related goods, home appliances, souvenirs, food items, etc. The company also operates restaurants, hotel pension stores, and shopping malls, as well as convenience stores under the Lawson name. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 71 retail stores, 14 restaurant, and 1 hotel pension store, as well as directly managed and franchised stores. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Ginowan, Japan.

2733.T.summary: Arata Corporation engages in the wholesale of daily goods and cosmetics in Japan. The company offers health and beauty products, including cosmetics, hair and body care, and healthcare products; household detergents, such as clothing detergents, home-related cleaners, and dishwashing and kitchen detergents; home care products, including insecticides, air fresheners and deodorizers, and batteries; paper products, which include tissues, toilet paper, and disposable diapers; and home goods comprising kitchen supplies, cleaning equipment, and cooking implements. It is also involved in the wholesale of pet food and accessories, perfumed soaps, tooth pastes, food and beverages, textile products, and miscellaneous goods; and store management activities. Arata Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3099.T.summary: Isetan Mitsukoshi Holdings Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the department store business in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Department Store Business, Credit & Finance/Customer Organization Management Business, Real Estate Business, and Other Business. It is involved in the credit card, insurance, and other businesses; designs, constructs, and manages underground garages, public underground passages, and underground shopping malls; leases shops; operates restaurants; and designs, constructs, and operates real estate properties, as well as offers tenant leasing and building maintenance and environment production services. The company also offers employment agency, recruitment office, personnel, education and training, and labor and welfare services, as well as information systems solutions. In addition, it engages in the supermarket, retail, and specialty shops; food production; wholesaling; and mail-order businesses, as well as operates airport style duty free shops. Further, the company plans, develops, imports, and sells gifts, novelty, and lifestyle goods; imports and wholesales western wine and spirits, foods, and miscellaneous products; and sells foodstuffs, clothing, and other daily goods. Additionally, it plans, produces, promotes, and sells commercials, video signs, TV programs, movies, plays, entertainment and fashion shows, parties, etc.; engages in advertising agency business; plans and sells travel products and conducts tours; owns and operates river cruise ships; and operates beauty and hair salons and sports clubs, and sells cosmetics. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3169.T.summary: Misawa & Co.,Ltd. operates and manages lifestyle shops, restaurants, and cafes in Japan. The company operates lifestyle shops under the unico and unico loom names. As of April 30, 2018, it operated 53 directly managed stores; 4 restaurants and cafes; and an online shop. The company was formerly known as Misawa Seiki Seisakusho Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Misawa & Co.,Ltd. in February 1988. Misawa & Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3583.T.summary: AuBEX CORPORATION manufactures and sells pen tips of felt pen in Japan and internationally. The company offers nibs made from polyester fibers, nylon fibers, plastics, and other materials for lighting, marking, painting, presentation, etc., used in various communication scenes, including offices, schools, research and medical institutions, and private for writing instrument makers and cosmetic OEM makers. It also provides medical devices, such as anesthesia related products comprising bethel fusers; and cardiac and vascular area related products that include hydrophilic guide wires, swan excel wires, and excelmed products for various business partners, national and public private university hospitals, and hospitals. The company was formerly known as Tokyo hat Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AuBEX CORPORATION in 1985. AuBEX CORPORATION was founded in 1892 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3RK.F.summary: Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells clothing, household goods, and food items under the MUJI brand. It operates cafÃ© and meal stores, campsites, and online stores. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells home furnishings, including furniture, accessories, antiques, curtains, and rugs. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 970 stores in Japan and internationally. The company also engages in the production, consultation, and design of living, retail, and other space. Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3RKU.F.summary: Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells clothing, household goods, and food items under the MUJI brand. It operates cafÃ© and meal stores, campsites, and online stores. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells home furnishings, including furniture, accessories, antiques, curtains, and rugs. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 970 stores in Japan and internationally. The company also engages in the production, consultation, and design of living, retail, and other space. Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

4558.T.summary: Chukyoiyakuhin Co.,Ltd. sells pharmaceuticals and quasi-drugs, health food products, soft drinks, medical equipment, cosmetics, daily necessities, clothing, food, water, and life and non-life insurance products. The company provides its products through mail order delivery. Chukyoiyakuhin Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Handa, Japan.

4HP.F.summary: Isetan Mitsukoshi Holdings Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the department store business in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Department Store Business, Credit & Finance/Customer Organization Management Business, Real Estate Business, and Other Business. It is involved in the credit card, insurance, and other businesses; designs, constructs, and manages underground garages, public underground passages, and underground shopping malls; leases shops; operates restaurants; and designs, constructs, and operates real estate properties, as well as offers tenant leasing and building maintenance and environment production services. The company also offers employment agency, recruitment office, personnel, education and training, and labor and welfare services, as well as information systems solutions. In addition, it engages in the supermarket, retail, and specialty shops; food production; wholesaling; and mail-order businesses, as well as operates airport style duty free shops. Further, the company plans, develops, imports, and sells gifts, novelty, and lifestyle goods; imports and wholesales western wine and spirits, foods, and miscellaneous products; and sells foodstuffs, clothing, and other daily goods. Additionally, it plans, produces, promotes, and sells commercials, video signs, TV programs, movies, plays, entertainment and fashion shows, parties, etc.; engages in advertising agency business; plans and sells travel products and conducts tours; owns and operates river cruise ships; and operates beauty and hair salons and sports clubs, and sells cosmetics. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7444.T.summary: Harima-Kyowa Co.,LTD. engages in the wholesale of daily necessities, cosmetics, and toiletries in Japan. It also provides logistics services for daily necessities, cosmetics, apparel, normal temperature food, bedding, pet supplies, etc. The company distributes its products to stores, including drug stores, supermarkets, and home improvement stores. In addition, it is involved in the leasing of real estate properties. Harima-Kyowa Co.,LTD. was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Himeji, Japan.

7453.T.summary: Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells clothing, household goods, and food items under the MUJI brand. It operates cafÃ© and meal stores, campsites, and online stores. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells home furnishings, including furniture, accessories, antiques, curtains, and rugs. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 970 stores in Japan and internationally. The company also engages in the production, consultation, and design of living, retail, and other space. Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

7512.T.summary: Aeon Hokkaido Corporation engages in the retail industry. It operates 78 stores. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan. Aeon Hokkaido Corporation is a subsidiary of Aeon Co., Ltd.

7601.T.summary: Poplar Co., Ltd. operates convenience stores in Japan. Its convenience stores offer pop valve, bento, rice balls, salads, noodles, bakery products, cooking breads, counter foods, and sweets. The company operates a chain of approximately 461 stores. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.

8217.T.summary: Okuwa Co., Ltd. operates supermarkets in Japan. Its stores offer groceries, liquor, rice, household products, upholstery, DIY, leisure goods, sports products, household appliances, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and clothing products. As of March 1, 2020, it operated 159 stores in Wakayama, Osaka, Nara, Mie, Hyogo, Aichi, Gifu, and Shizuoka. The company also operates in online shopping business. Okuwa Co., Ltd. was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Wakayama, Japan.

8233.T.summary: Takashimaya Company, Limited engages in the operation of department stores. Its department stores offer an array of products, including select brand items, jewelry, and art products, as well as everyday items, such as food products, clothing, utensils, personal items, household goods, and miscellaneous goods. The company is involved in the development and operation of shopping centers, restaurants, and cafes; provision design and interior decoration services for retail or cultural facilities; and credit card, shopping card, advertising agency, insurance agency, and e-commerce fashion businesses. In addition, it provides personnel services and solutions, including dispatching personnel, outsourcing, and training; wholesale and retail of liquor; alteration services for men's and women's clothing, as well as event planning services; and building maintenance services. The company operates 19 stores in Japan and 3 stores internationally. Takashimaya Company, Limited was founded in 1831 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8237.T.summary: Matsuya Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Ginza and Asakusa, Japan. Its department stores provide women's fashion products, cosmetics, fragrances, and watch and jewelry; men's fashion and sports products; children's wear and goods; and household goods. It also engages in mail order and related manufacturing, import/export, and wholesale businesses. Matsuya Co., Ltd. was founded in 1869 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8244.T.summary: Kintetsu Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1920 and is based in Osaka, Japan. Kintetsu Department Store Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Kintetsu Group Holdings Co., Ltd.

8247.T.summary: Daiwa Co., Ltd. operates departmental stores in Japan. The company operates through Korobo, Toyama, and Takaoka stores, as well an online shop. Daiwa Co., Ltd. was founded in 1923 and is headquartered in Kanazawa, Japan.

8254.T.summary: Saikaya Department Store Co.,Ltd. engages in department store business in Japan. The company was founded in 1872 and is headquartered in Kawasaki, Japan.

8255.T.summary: Axial Retailing Inc. operates a chain of supermarkets in Japan. It operates a network of 129 stores. The company was formerly known as Harashin Narus Holdings Co Ltd. and changed its name to Axial Retailing Inc. in October 2013. Axial Retailing Inc. was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in Nagaoka, Japan.

8260.T.summary: Izutsuya Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1935 and is based in Kitakyushu, Japan.

8267.T.summary: Aeon Co., Ltd. operates in the retail industry in Japan and internationally. It operates through GMS, SM, Health & Wellness, Financial Services, Shopping Center Development, Services & Specialty Store, and International segments. The GMS segment operates general merchandise stores, as well as specialty stores, which sell packaged lunches and household dishes. The SM segment operates supermarkets, discount stores, convenience stores, and small-scale supermarkets. The Health & Wellness segment operates drugstores, pharmacies, etc. The Financial Services segment provides credit card and banking services. The Shopping Center Development segment develops and leases shopping centers. The Services & Specialty Store segment offers facility management, amusement, and food services; and operates specialty stores selling family casual apparel, women's apparel, footwear, etc. The International segment operates retail stores in the ASEAN region and China. Aeon Co., Ltd. was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

8273.T.summary: Izumi Co., Ltd. operates a chain of stores in Japan. The company operates shopping centers under the Youme Town name; neighborhood shopping centers under the Youme Mall name; and food supermarkets under the Youme Mart name. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 197 stores, including 68 shopping centers, 117 supermarkets, 3 neighborhood shopping centers, and 9 other stores. The company was incorporated in 1942 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.

8276.T.summary: Heiwado Co.,Ltd. engages in the retailing of food, clothing, and housing related products in Japan. It operates 154 stores, including 74 stores in Shiga; 6 stores in Fukui; 7 stores in Ishikawa; 2 stores in Toyama; 18 stores in Kyoto; 21 stores in Osaka; 3 stores in Hyogo; 7 stores in Gifu; and 16 stores in Aichi. The company also operates 9 shops comprising 7 in Shigaa and 2 in Kyoto. Heiwado Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1948 and is based in Hikone, Japan.

9829.T.long_name: Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd.
9829.T.summary: Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. engages in the department stores business in Japan. The company was formerly known as Nagano Maruzen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. in September 1970. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Nagano, Japan. Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of TOKYU DEPARTMENT STORE CO.,LTD.

9946.T.summary: MINISTOP Co., Ltd. develops and franchises a chain of convenience stores under the MINISTOP name. The company also engages in the food manufacturing and supply business. As of October 31, 2020, it operated 5,304 stores, including 1,999 stores in Japan and 3,305 stores internationally. MINISTOP Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

9948.T.summary: ARCS Company Limited operates eight supermarkets in Japan. The company is also involved in building maintenance, insurance, resource environment, home improvement, and travel businesses. ARCS Company Limited was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan.

9956.T.summary: Valor Holdings Co., Ltd. operates supermarkets and home centers in Japan. It also operates drug stores, sports clubs, and pet shops. In addition, the company engages in the agricultural production, food manufacturing and processing, logistics, material procurement, maintenance, and cleaning activities. Further, it is involved in the warehousing, food wholesale, mushrooms and tomatoes cultivation and sale, miscellaneous goods and materials wholesale, horticultural material wholesale, flower wholesale, sale of clothing items and tennis equipment, insurance agency, and advertising agency businesses; sale of materials and tools related to internet; and ownership, development, acquisition, and operation of real estate, as well as provision of equipment maintenance and store cleaning services. Additionally, the company provides design, construction, management, repair, maintenance, renovation, cleaning, and security services of buildings. As of November 30, 2020, it operated 1,221 stores. Valor Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Tajimi, Japan.

AONNF.summary: Aeon Co., Ltd. operates in the retail industry in Japan and internationally. It operates through GMS, SM, Health & Wellness, Financial Services, Shopping Center Development, Services & Specialty Store, and International segments. The GMS segment operates general merchandise stores, as well as specialty stores, which sell packaged lunches and household dishes. The SM segment operates supermarkets, discount stores, convenience stores, and small-scale supermarkets. The Health & Wellness segment operates drugstores, pharmacies, etc. The Financial Services segment provides credit card and banking services. The Shopping Center Development segment develops and leases shopping centers. The Services & Specialty Store segment offers facility management, amusement, and food services; and operates specialty stores selling family casual apparel, women's apparel, footwear, etc. The International segment operates retail stores in the ASEAN region and China. Aeon Co., Ltd. was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

AONNY.summary: Aeon Co., Ltd. operates in the retail industry in Japan and internationally. It operates through GMS, SM, Health & Wellness, Financial Services, Shopping Center Development, Services & Specialty Store, and International segments. The GMS segment operates general merchandise stores, as well as specialty stores, which sell packaged lunches and household dishes. The SM segment operates supermarkets, discount stores, convenience stores, and small-scale supermarkets. The Health & Wellness segment operates drugstores, pharmacies, etc. The Financial Services segment provides credit card and banking services. The Shopping Center Development segment develops and leases shopping centers. The Services & Specialty Store segment offers facility management, amusement, and food services; and operates specialty stores selling family casual apparel, women's apparel, footwear, etc. The International segment operates retail stores in the ASEAN region and China. Aeon Co., Ltd. was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

HKU.F.summary: H2O Retailing Corporation operates department stores, supermarkets, and shopping centers in Japan. It operates through four segments: Department Store Business, Supermarket Business, Shopping Centre Business, and Other Businesses. The Department Store Business segment sells clothing, accessories, home furnishings, foods, and other products. The Supermarket Business segment operates general merchandise stores and supermarkets; and produces food products. The Shopping Centre Business segment provides rental management services for commercial facilities and building maintenance services. The Other Businesses segment engages in the hotel, remodeling, home delivery, membership management, temporary staffing, eating and drinking establishments, information processing, and other business activities. The company also manufactures and sells laver seaweed, prepared food, bread, dried foods, and furniture and furnishings; produces organic farm products; and sells apparel, toys, personal care products, uniforms, pet-accessories, furniture and interior goods, and electronic gift certificates. In addition, it engages in the planning, production management, and sale of women's apparel; data processing and systems development, book-keeping and payroll calculation, quality testing and consulting, and foreign trade activities; and management of internet shopping site, cafÃ©, company cafeteria, and restaurants. Further, the company operates salons for bridal use; and offers manpower dispatching and employment agency services. Additionally, it provides property management and development services. The company was formerly known as Hankyu Department Stores, Inc. and changed its name to H2O Retailing Corporation in October 2007. H2O Retailing Corporation was founded in 1929 and is based in Osaka, Japan.

JFM.F.summary: J. Front Retailing Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates department stores. The company operates through Department Store Business, PARCO Business, Real Estate Business, and Credit and Finance Business segments. The Department Store Business segment offers cloths, general and household goods, food, and other products. This segment operates 16 Daimaru and Matsuzakaya stores. The PARCO Business undertakes development, management, supervision, and operation of shopping centers. This segment operates 18 shopping complexes. The Real Estate Business segment develops, supervises, and operates real estate properties. The Credit and Finance Business segment is involved in the issuance and administration of credit cards. The company also engages in the restaurant, wholesale, staffing, merchandise inspection and consulting, parking, leasing, direct marketing, and labor dispatch services; import and export activities; design, supervision, and contracting construction works; and manufacture and sale of furniture. J. Front Retailing Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

RYKKY.summary: Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells clothing, household goods, and food items under the MUJI brand. It operates cafÃ© and meal stores, campsites, and online stores. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells home furnishings, including furniture, accessories, antiques, curtains, and rugs. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 970 stores in Japan and internationally. The company also engages in the production, consultation, and design of living, retail, and other space. Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

TKM.F.summary: Takashimaya Company, Limited engages in the operation of department stores. Its department stores offer an array of products, including select brand items, jewelry, and art products, as well as everyday items, such as food products, clothing, utensils, personal items, household goods, and miscellaneous goods. The company is involved in the development and operation of shopping centers, restaurants, and cafes; provision design and interior decoration services for retail or cultural facilities; and credit card, shopping card, advertising agency, insurance agency, and e-commerce fashion businesses. In addition, it provides personnel services and solutions, including dispatching personnel, outsourcing, and training; wholesale and retail of liquor; alteration services for men's and women's clothing, as well as event planning services; and building maintenance services. The company operates 19 stores in Japan and 3 stores internationally. Takashimaya Company, Limited was founded in 1831 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
